title: 09/28: Mailbag and Regulatin' with Rich Hribar! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Special guest Rich Hribar (@LordReebs) joins the show to answer your start/sit, trade and Regulators questions. We go through some of the news from Friday afternoon (5:20) and tell you if Paul Richardson is a good sleeper before getting to the questions. First, some trade talk (11:40), then Fantasy Regulators Part One (33:00), Start or Sit questions (39:50) followed by a second round of Regulators (54:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: We've got a bunch of your start or sit questions, plus trade questions and Fantasy Regulators to get you ready for Week 4!
